summary: Project appears to be a habit/mood tracking app with a streak counter and mood check-in, with planned UI/UX enhancements.

existing_features.title: Show a small, time-limited celebratory message in the UI when a signed-in user successfully completes a daily check-in and their streak increases (i.e., they kept their streak going).

Update the check-in success flow to determine whether the streak was extended by comparing the new streak value returned by updateDailyTracker() with the previously cached/loaded streak value, and trigger the celebratory message only when the new value is greater than the previous value.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a small celebratory message when a user keeps their streak going
